title: 129 How to Find Joy in the Journey (when everything sucks)
description:
"You were born for greatness, but it doesn't happen overnight. So you must find joy in the journey." - Lewis Howes
If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes and other episodes at www.lewishowes.com/129.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
